entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
